title: Dropimage
description: An image of a crystallization drop.

mimeType.description: The MIME type of the image.

lightType.description: The light used to capture the image.

timestamp.description: The date and time when the image was captured. This is to be specified in UTC and conform to ISO 8601.

url.description: A URL where the image can be found. It is assumed that no further authentication is needed to read this image.

path.description: A filesystem path where the image can be found. It is assumed that both sender and receiver have permission to read the image.
